description: It doesn't do much, but it's easy and gets out of the way. If it had some status icons or idle detection it would be a good choice.
Allows me to track me time easily and produces good reports.

I can track my time very easily with this tool. It is just a matter of entering a description of what was done since the last entry. The log can be modified later if corrections are needed. Very nice piece of software!
greenlantrn2 surfaces, if this is you, i put my vouch on whatever this man touches, but he must verify with me first.

description: Most time tracking requires you to plan your start time, this one thinks about it after you have finished. It's simple and works, highly under-rated.
summary: Track your time after you complete the action

description: Die Anwendung ist schön klein und macht genau das was sie soll, ohne großen Schnick Schnack.
The application is useful. Easy to set up and to adjust the data afterward.

The application uses two text files: one for the standard task list and one for the time log. Once you have understood how it works (at the start of your day work begin a task "arrived" and then explain each task at the end of it) it usually only takes two clicks for starting or stopping a task. To fix error, sync problems (when using it on multiple devices), it is only text file to edit.
Brilliant.
